Subject: Ragnar and Katya (maxies)

After some hiking, the two metal warriors came up a rocky ridge, and a 
grassy plain extended to the north. Suddenly, the Loremaster stopped.

Ragnar: What is it, Katya? Is there something wrong?

Katya: I am not certain... It think I saw something beyond that forest 
to the west... Unless... (she switched to magnetic resonance) Yes! 
There is something! A large metallic form about the size of a 
dropship!

Ragnar let out a cry of victory. He jumped on place and felt 
overjoyed.

Ragnar: Yes! Maybe we will beat this stravag planet! Let us go that 
way!

As he started forward, Katya crossed her arms, not moving and cleared 
her throat.

Katya: Are you not forgetting something, quiaff?

Ragnar: Neg, Katya Kerensky. If it is hostiles you fear, I do not 
understand why. We are battlemechs after all and we will move at a 
medium distance from each other. This way, we will be able to 
retaliate together without fearing group shots against both of us. 
Besides, I have yet to believe any hostiles are here.

Katya: I see your point, but let us be prudent. Take the lead.

And so they went, approaching the Maximal base and entering scanner 
range.
